co.cask.cdap.api.workflow
Class AbstractWorkflow

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.cdap.api.workflow.AbstractWorkflow
All Implemented Interfaces:
Workflow
public abstract class AbstractWorkflow
extends Object
implements Workflow

Provides a default implementation of Workflow methods for easy extension.

Example of configuring a workflow: 

    
      @Override
      public void configure() {
        setName("PurchaseHistoryWorkflow");
        setDescription("PurchaseHistoryWorkflow description");
        addMapReduce("PurchaseHistoryBuilder");
      }
See the Purchase example application.
